extendedInfo.description: One of the most vital elements for the human body is Blood Pressure. Many ailments are caused when there are irregularities in the Blood Pressure levels. Doctors generally advice to keep a track of BP levels throughout the day, but after a few days it often becomes tiresome to note down these details. Thus we have developed something you would like to add in your life.Now you won't have to carry a heavy log of your Blood Pressure history. All you need is this ever useful application. Whether you checked your blood pressure at home or just visited the doctor, update your digital log in your mobile device. You can keep a track of previous Blood Pressure readings, and it is always available in your mobile for quick reference.â	Record your Systolic and Diastolic Blood pressures for ready reference.â	Enter your details like Name, Age, Gender, Blood Group, Height, Weight (SI/US units) etc.â	Easy to use, and uses very less or minimal memory in mobile.â	Enter your daily / periodic blood pressure readings in the Application.â	Unlimited users, you can keep record of many patients. Extremely helpful for Doctors.â	You and your doctor can analyze your blood pressure history accurately.â	View a graphical presentation anytime you need, and monitor your health.â	Symptoms and Useful tips to help you keep your blood pressure in control.A beautiful, intuitive user interface, makes it a breeze to enter all your key data on a day-to-day basis. This handy app will make sure that you that never loose your BP readings!"Please don't leave negative remarks/complaints on this page. We do appreciate suggestions to make the application work better and would love to sort out the issues and your complaints.Our developers work hard to give you the best experience with our apps.If you are not satisfied with our application, mail your reviews, complaints, and suggestions to- support@migital.com "Health, blood, pressure, efficient, useful, graph, graphical, doctor, sick, ill, track, record, family

reviews.title: adds a lot of spamware
reviews.comment: I was annoyed by this program and the extreme amount of spamware that it has added to my phone. It also doesn\'t keep accurate history either. I added my blood pressure every day for a week and it listed it as once a month in 2010. DO NOT download. Now I have to do a factory reset on my phone again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sent me spam at 6 am
reviews.comment: Installed this yesterday. This morning they sent me a message which woke me up. it said \"get a car for 70 dollars a month.\"

reviews.title: Thumbs Down!
reviews.comment: Needs to give the option to pay the $2 through Google Play. To only allow purchase through a 4th party is, IMHO, bad business practice, especially when you don\'t know if you can trust the 4th party check out company.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boo! Pop up ads!
reviews.comment: Ads on the app is one thing. To have them pop up on my phone in the top alert bar is a whole different level that ISN\'T wanted. Boo! Poor form. Uninstalled!!!!!!!!
